description: Barry Cowen denies trying to evade police officers during a drink-driving incident in 2016.
title: Barry Cowen: Refusal to address the Dail 'behind sacking'
title_page: Barry Cowen: Refusal to address the Dail 'behind sacking' - BBC News
maintext: Speaking in the D¨¢il on Wednesday, the taoiseach said he had made it clear to Mr Cowen on Tuesday morning that he should come into the house and make a statement, but that he had refused to do so.
